A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Absolutely worth the watch! Amazing visuals\, great acting\, amazing plot. The list could good on. I love what the director did with this movie\, he filled in the gabs for what the other star wars films needed. Such as: the red guards. They don't just stand there now. Luke Skywalker not standing on a cliff. 

The fight scenes are phenomenal. Luke Ren has an extremely satisfying fight form now. He isn't just gets punch bag. 

All in all. Star wars the last jedi isn't just a film. It's a movement. This has me excited for the years too come. Hopefully one day I will be able to directed a star wars film. This film has inspired me to do so!
